thread.title: Janet Sanfilippo
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Janet Sanfilippo

author: Janet Sanfilippo
title: Janet Sanfilippo
text: I used goaway travel to book my trip to Australia. Kimberly was wonderful and responsive. She put our trip together in about three days, and we kept changing our mind on things. Also. There were times that my contact at the city office to change the date of a tour that I had missed, everybody was helpful and accomadating --
